bibl.title: Women, Law, and Social Realities in Late Antiquity: A Review Article.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Joëlle BEAUCAMP, Le statut de la femme à Byzance (4e-7e siècle). I. Le droit impérial; - II. Les pratiques sociales = TravMém. Monographies. 5; - 6 (Paris, 1990-1992). - 1. Imperial Law. - 2. Social Practices. - 3. Critical Reflections.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Women, Law, and Social Realities in Late Antiquity: A Review Article.
